summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department, accepting an easement from Robert S. Roberts and Anne G. Roberts, husband and wife and Timothy M. Sorensen and Lorraine M. Sorensen, husband and wife, for and in consideration of Mutual and Offsetting Benefits, for a water meter and appurtenances, over portions of Lots 1 & 2, Block 4, Salmon Creek Addition, as per plat recorded in Volume 23 of Plats, Page 22, records of King County, Washington, lying West of Ambaum Blvd S.W.
